AI Description: GeneMark is a gene prediction software for prokaryotic and eukaryotic genomes. It uses state-of-the-art algorithms to accurately identify protein-coding genes.
Core Features:
1. Prediction of protein-coding genes in prokaryotic and eukaryotic genomes.
2. Utilizes advanced algorithms for accurate gene prediction.
3. Provides annotations for predicted genes.
General Tags: Gene Prediction, Prokaryotic Genomes, Eukaryotic Genomes
